headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against Hasbro, Inc. - HAS
summary: NEW YORK, Nov. 25, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Hasbro, Inc.  . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...
